class.name: SparseRealVector
class.javadoc:
Marker class for RealVectors that require sparse backing storage
$Id: SparseRealVector.java 1416643 2012-12-03 19:37:14Z tn $
2.0
As of version 3.1, this class is deprecated, for reasons exposed in this JIRA ticket. This class will be removed in version 4.0.
